examples.translation: 每个学生都有导师指导他们写论文。
examples.last: to advise on the writing of the dissertation.

examples.translation: 领导总是让刚开始工作的新职员值夜班。
examples.last: always start his new employee on the lobster shift.

examples.translation: 他们的主管是个年轻的女士。

n: one who supervises or has charge and direction of
a program that controls the execution of other programs
监督人, 管理人, 检查员, 督学, 主管人,导师
